input_text:
Job Title: User Experience Web Designer (San Diego)

Location: San Diego, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Are you looking for more than just a job? Do you want to have a voice and feel a sense of belonging? At ICW Group, we hire innovative people who consistently adapt, grow and deliver. We believe in hard work, a fun work environment, and embracing creativity that only comes about when talented people collaborate to develop solutions. Our mission is to create the best insurance experience possible.

Headquartered in San Diego with regional offices located throughout the United States, ICW Group has been named for seven consecutive years as a Top 50 performing P&C company offering the stability of a large, profitable and growing company combined with a small-company entrepreneurial spirit. Our purpose-driven ethos provides team members with opportunities to contribute, develop, and belong.

Our Marketing team is seeking a talented and passionate User Experience Web Designer to help shape the future of our digital presence. This role will allow you to research and analyze user behavior, identify requirements, and propose solutions that translate business needs into engaging user experiences on screens of all sizes. This position exists to define and ensure consistency for User Experience (UX) design standards across the enterprise.

WHAT YOU WILL DO

Drives end-to-end interaction design.

Works with business stakeholders, project owners, and internal departments to collect design requirements.Develops web assets that are easy and engaging for ICW Group’s various customer sets.Creates wireframes, storyboards, low and high-fidelity mockups, screen flows, and prototypes.Develops experience personas and usage scenarios. Conducts usability testing and analysis, presents results, and incorporates results into the design process.

Takes empathetic approach to web UX.

Advocates for customer needs and requirements while meeting detailed project schedules.Designs web interfaces that are intuitive and innovative.Creates great user experiences through user-centered design.

Collaborates with programmers and contribute to overall company practices.

Works with back-end WordPress programmers and graphic designers to ensure the visual design reflects best practices and consistency.Recommends and implements best practices to be used in all product designs.Collaborates with others to create inspiring digital content experiences.

WHAT YOU BRING TO THE ROLE

Bachelor's degree from four-year college or university preferred with a major or emphasis in Visual Design, Computer Science, Information Architecture, or related field. Minimum 3-5 years of related experience. 

KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS

Ability to self-direct and collaborate with strong communication, time-management, and process management skills.Must be up to date with latest developments in UX/UI design required. Ability to develop user interface design, human-computer interaction and usability. Working knowledge of web designer, UX designer, information architect, interaction designer, or similar role working on large-scale custom sites. Ability to use Creativity and graphic design combined with technical expertise and attention to detail is critical. Must provide portfolio of UX-focused work samples for web and mobile applications.Previous experience working in marketing a plus. Business-to-business/financial services experience a plus.Previous experience working with Salesforce and WordPress platforms a plus.

COMPENSATION

The current salary range for this position is $86,247.55 to $145,450.54. This range is exclusive of fringe benefits and potential bonuses. If hired at ICW Group, your final base salary compensation will be determined by factors unique to each candidate; including experience, education, and location of the role and considers employees performing substantially similar work.

WHY JOIN ICW GROUP? 

Challenging work and the ability to make a differenceYou will have a voice and feel a sense of belongingWe offer a competitive benefits package, with generous medical, dental, and vision plans as well as 401K retirement plans and company matchBonus potential for all positionsPaid Time Off with an accrual rate of 5.23 hours per pay period (equal to 17 days per year)10 paid holidays throughout the calendar yearWant to continue learning? We’ll support you 100%

ICW Group is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. ICW Group will not discriminate against an applicant or employee on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, ancestry, sex/gender, age, physical or mental disability, military or veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, marital status, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state or local law.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

Develops experience personas and usage scenarios

The company's mission is to create the best insurance experience possible.
